channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kevin O’Leary Says This Is the Biggest Opportunity in AI for Entrepreneurs Right Now
item.description: If the ‘Shark Tank’ host were starting a business now, this is where he would focus his efforts.

item.title: Remote professionals are quiet quitting Fridays. Their rebellion could open the door to a 4-day work week
item.description: The American Time Use Survey shows that from 2019 to 2024, the average number of minutes worked on Fridays fell by about 90 minutes in remote position...

item.title: As Tokyo embraces a 4-day workweek to fight ‘death by overwork,’ Japan’s new prime minister just called a 3 a.m. meeting
item.description: The Japanese leader only sleeps two to four hours a night—and has personally pledged to ditch work-life balance in favor of “work, work, work.”

item.title: This New Credit Card Is Giving the World’s Wealthy an AmEx Platinum Alternative—No SSN Required
item.description: With 22 banking partners and $5.4 million in funding, Karta is bringing luxury perks to an overlooked class of U.S.-connected customers.

item.title: An AI Tool Withheld an Employee’s Paycheck. That’s Really a Human Error
item.description: AI automates plenty of repetitive tasks, like running payroll, but you need a human to check its work.

item.title: Craft Brewers Are About to Get Hit Hard By a New Law in the Shutdown Bill
Quantum Computing Inc: Stock price soars on earnings beat in volatile year for quantum stocks
item.description: As of this writing, shares in Quantum Computing Inc. (Nasdaq: QUBT) are spiking in premarket trading, with the stock price up over 15%. That’s a relat...

item.title: Meet the dads choosing caring for kids over careers: ‘Men are starting to realize that missing crucial morning time and bedtime adds up’
item.description: Not a single stay-at-home father that Fortune spoke to had any regrets about swapping sending emails for changing diapers.

item.title: FAA ends shutdown-related flight restrictions, allowing airlines to resume schedules

item.title: These 5 AI Startups Raised the Most Money in 2025
item.description: These AI startups raised record amounts of cash this year—and these companies topped the list.

item.title: America’s path out of $38 trillion national debt crisis likely involves pushing up inflation and ‘eroding Fed independence,’ says JPMorgan Private Bank
item.description: The government could "tolerate stronger growth and higher inflation, allowing real interest rates to fall and the debt burden to shrink over time," JP...

item.title: Loneliness is rising. Here’s how to reconnect with old friends

item.title: Companies and countries can stay nimble even as they navigate the ‘unexploded ordinance’ of U.S.-China competition, experts say
item.description: There's “incredibly high stakes" on the geopolitical front, foreign policy expert James Crabtree said during the Fortune Innovation Forum.
